# Third Wave Capital
> An independent investment management firm deploying a long-short strategy across global healthcare and technology sectors.

## About
Third Wave Capital is a UK-based investment management and corporate training firm founded by Surojit Chakraverti.

### Proprietary Investments
- Long/short equity strategy: Healthcare & Technology sectors
- India Futures & Options: Sector Agnostic
- Commodities: Precious & Base Metals, Energies

### Corporate Training
Tailored professional development programs for investment banking, credit, asset management, and technology/product design teams.

## Team
- Surojit Chakraverti (Founder & CIO) - Former Redline Capital Partners, Citigroup, Rothschild & Co. BSc Accounting & Finance, University of Warwick.
- Bhavya Jain (Partner) - 10+ years in Strategy, Sales, Business Development. Law degree, University of Bristol.

## Contact
